title: If they do not join till the building permission to the Project is given, they will completely lose the right to any built-up tenement, and their tenement shall be taken over by the SRA and used for the purpose of accommodating pavement dwellers and other slum dwellers who cannot be accommodated in situ etc
clause_text: If they do not join till the building permission to the Project is given, they will completely lose the right to any built-up tenement, and their tenement shall be taken over by the SRA and used for the purpose of accommodating pavement dwellers and other slum dwellers who cannot be accommodated in situ etc.
